original_text: ‘ Lord God, they have killed your prophets. They have destroyed the altars where people offered sacrifices to you. I am the only person alive who still serves you. And they are trying to kill me.’
korean_text: 주여 그들이 주의 선지자들을 죽였으며 주의 제단들을 헐어 버렸고 나만 남았는데 내 목숨도 찾나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Lord God, they have killed your prophets.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님, 그들이 당신의 선지자들을 죽였습니다.

sentences.original_text: where people offered sacrifices to you.
I am the only person alive
And they are trying to kill me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 나를 죽이려고 하고 있습니다.
